overview:
Prior to joining AeroSurgical, Conor Duffy was a Senior Scientist in charge of Aerosol Science at Aerogen where he played a central role in developing formulations with pharmaceutical companies that partnered with Aerogen.

Prior to Aerogen, Conor served in quality roles at In Vitro Diagnostic (IVD) as well as managing a quality control function for an Irish biopharmaceutical company that produced human recombinant protein for therapeutic use. Conor holds a degree in Biochemistry from Trinity College Dublin and a Ph.D. from NUI Galway.
